about_the_game:
Take revenge on your neighbor sisters with a hypnotic gun

This movie
You can enjoy harem play with two sisters.
You can use the hypnosis gun at any time and change the situation.
You can change the situation.
The girls are fully voiced, so you can enjoy realistic play.

Runs in a variety of environments
Quest 2 (OculusLink)
HtcVive　
All have been tested on actual devices
Operation on PC desktop is also supported.

VR controller operation linkage
Controller linked to movement while grip keys are pressed.
The controller shakes in accordance with the movement.

VR controller vibration function
Vibrates in accordance with the girl who moves automatically.

Electric masturbator compatible
It moves in conjunction with the girl's movement and the controller's movement.
Operation has been confirmed with A10 Cyclone SA.

Operation Method

0 VR Controller
Analog stick" Move
Analog stick + Trigger key" Turn, up/down
Trigger key" Use
Grip keys" Hold
1, 2, 3, 4 tap" Hentai menu
1, 2, 3, 4 button press and hold" Menu

0 PC desktop mode
Mouse Point of View
Mouse left click Use, Hold, Hentai
Mouse right click" Mode change
Mouse center click" Hentai menu
WSAD key - Move
Spacebar" Up
Shift key - Down
F key" Menu

About operation

0Desktop PC
win10GamingPC(Can be displayed and played on a monitor)

0PCVR
win10GamingPC
Meta Quest 2(OculusLink) confirmed on actual device
HtcVive Operation confirmed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Time to take revenge on your neighbor's beautiful sisters. Let's get in with hypnosis gun in hand! VR compatible, experiential, hypnosis game. Playable on either PCVR or PC desktop.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
